attributes.action: All key workers are not paying tax over the pandemic
attributes.additional_details: Because it would show that we are not putting our lives at risk for nothing we are needed to keep this country going. And we should be rewarded for that
attributes.background: All of the Key workers should not be paying tax on what they earn because most people are at home on 80 % doing nothing and staying safe meanwhile key workers are putting lives at risk and are physically and mentally exhausted keeping this country going.
